intro: Ouret microphylla, commonly known as the small-leaved ouret, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features small, narrow leaves that are densely arranged along its stems. Its flowers are typically yellow or orange, with ray florets surrounding a central disk of tubular flowers. Ouret microphylla is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
